title: Spiked Trefoil Milkshake Recipe
full_text:
Spiked Trefoil Milkshake Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Cook
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Refrigerating Time
60 mins
Total
75 mins
Makes
2 milkshakes
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
15
Trefoil cookies
1 1/2
cups
whole milk
2 1/2
cups
vanilla ice cream
(
15
ounces
/ about
5
medium scoops
)
1/2
ounce
bourbon
1
pinch
salt
Garnish:
Whipped cream
and
crumbled Trefoil cookies
Directions
Preheat oven to 350°F. Toast cookies in oven on a foil-lined baking sheet until fragrant and slightly darker in color, about 5 minutes. Remove from oven. Using tongs, add to a sealable container. Add milk and cover. Refrigerate at least 1 hour and up to 3 hours.
Strain milk mixture into blender. Discard cookie solids. Add ice cream, bourbon, and salt to blender. Purée until smooth.
Divide among serving glasses, top with whipped cream and crumbled cookies.
Special equipment
Blender, fine-mesh strainer
Frozen Drinks
Ice Cream
Whiskey
